Why do they never serve beer at a math party?
jokes.punchLine: Because you can’t drink and derive!

jokes.setup: It takes me five minutes to walk to the local pub and 25 mins to walk back from it

jokes.punchLine: You can turn it into regular beer by pouring it into a square cup!

jokes.setup: A neutron walks into a bar and asks, “how much for a beer?”
jokes.punchLine: The bartender replies, “for you? No charge!”
